channel.title: NPC agression? (a few other problems)
channel.description:
how do i make it so the NPC`S attack when i am attacking it?
and also id like to know a few other things please -
-changing bonuses in item.java (the meaning of each number)
-changing wildy into safe zones and vice verca
-adding death emote to any monster
-adding telleport emote after the character has clicked the portal
any help whould be great thanks
and if anyone has the correct bandos boss model please post it or tell me where to get it
-lewis`

item.title: NPC agression? (a few other problems)
item.dc:creator: @jc22493 Jc22493
item.description:
@jc22493 wrote:

-changing wildy into safe zones and vice verca
Either the nonWild() method or the isinWilderness() method.

-adding death emote to any monster
Probably configured through the NPCHandler class.

-adding telleport emote after the character has clicked the portal

case #: teleportToX = ####; teleportToY = ####; setAnimation(###); // Use the variable that your source uses. break;

Read full topic

item.title: NPC agression? (a few other problems)
item.dc:creator: @lewis2 lewis`
item.description:
@lewis2 wrote:

[quote=“spon80, post:2, topic:279603”]1 sec ill get you item bonuses[br][br][size=1]Posted on: May 21, 2009, 12:28:01 pm[/size][hr]search in item.cfg and search an item you want to change IE Whip

item = 4151	Abyssal_whip	A_weapon_from_the_abyss.	1600000	1600000	1600000	0	97	35	45	15	24	56	12	0	0	97	0

first 3 are alches and shop price,
next is attack bonuses:
0-stab
97-slash
35-crush
45-magic
15-range
Defence:
stab-24
slash-56
crush-12
magic-0
range-0
strength-97
prayer-0[/quote]

Thank you very much.

Read full topic
